pages.text: 20|13|naega neoleul seontaeghayeoss-euni gye sidoeneun geos-e gyeongcheonghala
20|14|sillo naega hananim-iyo na oeeneun sin-i eobsnani naman-eul gyeongbaeha go yebaehamyeo naman-eul saeng-gaghala
20|15|sillo jongmal-i dagaogo iss-eu na naega geugeos-eul sumgilyeo ham-eun modeun salam-i geuga nolyeoghan daelo bosang-eul baddolog ham-ila
20|16|geugeos-eul midji anihago geuui yogmang-eul ttaleuneun jadeullo hayeogeum neo leul jeonhwanhaji anihadolog halini ineun nega myeolmangchi anihadolog ham ila
20|17|moseyeo ne oleunson-e issneun geugeos-i mueos-inyo
20|18|geuga daedabhagil geugeos-eun je jikkong-iibnida jega geugeos-e gidaego geugeos-eulo namu ipdeul-eul ttaelyeoseo yang eul meog-imyeo geu an-eseo daleun yuyongham eul chajnaida lago hani
20|19|geubunkkeseo moseya geugeos-eul deon jyeola hasimae
20|20|geuga geugeos-eul deonjini han mali ui baem-idoeeo jaeppalli gieogadeola
20|21|ittae geubunkkeseo moseya geugeos eul jwieola geuligo dulyeowohaji mal la naega geugeos-eul dasi wonsangtaelo halila
20|22|geudaeui son-eul neoui gyeodeulang-i e neoh-eula amuleon sonsang-i eobs-i ha yahge naolini ineun tto daleun yejeung ila
20|23|ileohge hayeo hananim-i neoe ge gajang widaehan hananim-ui yejeung-eul boilyeo ham-ila
20|24|palao-ege ga boala geuneun sillo modeun hangyeleul neom-eoseon omanhan jala
20|25|ittae mosega juyeo jeoleul wihaejeoui ma-eum-eul hwaljjag yeol-eojusoseo
20|26|geuligo jeoui il-i swibdolog hayeo jusoseo
20|27|jeoui hyeoe jang-aemul-eul jegeoha yeo jujoseo
20|28|geulihayeo geudeul-i jeoui mal-eul ihaehadolog hayeo jusoseo
20|29|jeoui gajogjung-ui han salam-i jeoui bowanjaga doedolog hayeo juso seo
20|30|alon-eun jeoui hyeongjeini
20|31|geulo hayeogeum jeoleul ganghage hago
20|32|geuga jeoui il-e hamkke hayeo jusoseo
20|33|ineun jeohuiga dangsin-eul keuge chanmihago
20|34|jeohuiga dangsin-eul keuge yeom-wonha goja haobnida
20|35|sillo dangsin-eun jeohuideul-eul bogo gyesinaida
20|36|ie geubun-ui malsseum-i iss-eoss-eu ni moseya neoui yoguga ilueojyeoss nola
20|37|hananim-eun daleun ttaeedo neoe ge eunheleul bepul-eossnola
